title: Leek and courgette quiche
ingredients: ['1 (375g) ready rolled puff pastry', '2 chicken fillets, cubed', '3 stalk leeks, sliced and thoroughly washed', '1 courgette, sliced', '1 tablespoon oil', 'salt and pepper', '2 teaspoons hot curry powder, to taste', 'a few springs fresh coriander, minced', '250g 0% natural yoghurt', '3 eggs', 'grated cheese, to taste']
